argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | brdomain.1 | |- A e. _V |
| 2 |  | brdomain.2 | |- B e. _V |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_brimage | |- ( A Image ( 1st |` ( _V X. _V ) ) B <-> B = ( ( 1st |` ( _V X. _V ) ) " A ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-domain | |- Domain = Image ( 1st |` ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_breqi | |- ( A Domain B <-> A Image ( 1st |` ( _V X. _V ) ) B ) |
| 6 |  | #P_dfdm5 | |- dom A = ( ( 1st |` ( _V X. _V ) ) " A ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eqeq2i | |- ( B = dom A <-> B = ( ( 1st |` ( _V X. _V ) ) " A ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 5, 7 | #P_3bitr4i | |- ( A Domain B <-> B = dom A ) |
